md:
giải nghĩa từ "enclosing" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Enclosing (verb):
	+ Meaning: To surround or enclose something completely.
	+ Vietnamese: bao quanh, bao bọc.
	+ Example sentence: The walls enclosing the garden were covered with ivy.
	+ Related words: surround, enclose, encompass, envelop.

* Enclosing (noun):
	+ Meaning: Something that surrounds or encloses something else.
	+ Vietnamese: bao quanh, vỏ bọc.
	+ Example sentence: The enclosing walls of the castle were very thick.
	+ Related words: enclosure, surround, envelope.

Note: The verb "enclosing" can also be used in the context of sending a document or package, meaning to include or attach something to it. For example: "I am enclosing a copy of the contract with this letter." In this case, the Vietnamese translation would be "đính kèm" or "gửi kèm".

  • Enclosing (verb):

    • Example sentence: The walls enclosing the garden were covered with ivy.
    • Related words: surround, enclose, encompass, envelop.

  • Enclosing (noun):

    • Meaning: Something that surrounds or encloses something else.
    • Vietnamese: bao quanh, vỏ bọc.
    • Example sentence: The enclosing walls of the castle were very thick.
    • Related words: enclosure, surround, envelope.

Note: The verb "enclosing" can also be used in the context of sending a document or package, meaning to include or attach something to it. For example: "I am enclosing a copy of the contract with this letter." In this case, the Vietnamese translation would be "đính kèm" or "gửi kèm".
